app.title: IAMEDIC

studyCreateDialog.studyAliasMaxLength: Study alias must be less than 255 characters

storageUsage.storageAlmostFull: Storage is almost full. Delete unused media files to free up space.
storageUsage.storageRunningLow: Storage is running low. Consider cleaning up old files.

mediaUpload.dragAndDropFiles: Drag and drop your media files here
mediaUpload.supportedFormats: Supported formats: Images (JPEG, PNG, GIF, BMP, TIFF, WebP, SVG, ICO) and Videos (MP4, AVI, MOV, WMV, WebM, 3GP, FLV, MKV, OGG, MPEG)
mediaUpload.pleaseWait: Please wait while your files are being uploaded.
mediaUpload.fileSizeExceeded: File size must be less than 1GB
mediaUpload.unsupportedImageFormat: Unsupported image format. Supported: JPEG, PNG, GIF, BMP, TIFF, WebP, SVG, ICO
mediaUpload.unsupportedVideoFormat: Unsupported video format. Supported: MP4, AVI, MOV, WMV, WebM, 3GP, FLV, MKV, OGG, MPEG
mediaUpload.unsupportedFileType: File must be an image or video

mediaUpload.storageLowUpload: Storage is running low ({percent}% used). Consider cleaning up old files.

mediaGallery.unsavedChangesMessage: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to close without saving?

doctorRegistration.fillInformation: Please fill in your professional information to complete your registration. This information will be reviewed by an administrator.
doctorRegistration.matriculationIdHelper: Your unique professional medical license number
doctorRegistration.legalNameHelper: Your full legal name as it appears on your medical license
doctorRegistration.specializationHelper: Your medical specialization (e.g., Cardiology, Neurology, etc.)
doctorRegistration.profileUpdated: Doctor profile updated successfully. Your registration is now pending review.
doctorRegistration.profileSubmitted: Doctor profile submitted successfully. Your registration is now pending review.
doctorRegistration.registrationApproved: Your doctor registration has been approved! You now have access to the doctor dashboard.
doctorRegistration.registrationApprovedContactAdmin: Your registration has been approved. Contact an administrator if you need to make changes.

annotations.selectClass: Select class to create new bounding box
annotations.clickAndDrag: Click and drag on the image to create a new bounding box
annotations.allClassesPresent: All available classes are already present
annotations.noPredictionAvailable: No prediction available. Click "Get Usefulness Prediction" to generate one.
annotations.modelPredictsUseful: The Classification Model predicts this image is useful
annotations.modelPredictsNotUseful: The Classification Model predicts this image is not useful

videoPlayer.noFramesExtracted: No frames extracted yet. Click 'Extract Frame' while watching the video.
videoPlayer.runThresholdDesc: Minimum probability threshold for starting a run. Lower values will detect more potential regions but may include false positives.
videoPlayer.minRunLengthDesc: Minimum number of consecutive frames to consider a valid run. Higher values require longer consistent predictions.
videoPlayer.predictionThresholdDesc: Minimum probability threshold for extracting a frame. Only frames with predictions above this value will be extracted.
videoPlayer.patienceDesc: Number of frames below threshold before ending a run. Higher patience allows for brief dips in prediction confidence.

callbackPage.pleaseWaitLogin: Please wait while we complete your login.

streaming.requestCameraAccess: Please allow camera access to start streaming
streaming.cameraAccessDeniedHelp: Please allow camera access in your browser settings or connect a camera device.
streaming.noCamerasFound: No cameras found. Please connect a camera device.
streaming.framesInfo: Frames automatically extracted based on AI analysis
streaming.recordingTimeWarningMessage: Recording will automatically stop in {timeRemaining}. You can stop now to save your recording.
streaming.confirmStopRecordingMessage: Do you want to stop the recording? Duration: {duration}, File size: {fileSize}, Frames extracted: {frames}
streaming.fileSizeLimitReached: Recording stopped: 1GB file size limit reached
streaming.chunkUploadError: Failed to upload video data to server

description.recording: Live AI analysis confidence over the last 10 seconds
description.notRecording: Start recording to see real-time AI confidence analysis

fileManagement.title: File Management
fileManagement.warningMessage: This will permanently delete orphaned files from the storage system. This operation cannot be undone.
fileManagement.hiddenFilesInfo: These files are hidden from users but still consuming storage space
fileManagement.hardDeleteInfo: Hard delete will permanently remove them from the database and file system
fileManagement.willFreeStorage: Will free up {size} MB of storage
fileManagement.noSoftDeletedFiles: âœ… No soft-deleted files found. Your storage is clean!
fileManagement.softDeletedFilesNote: Soft-deleted files are created when users delete studies or media files. They remain in the system for potential recovery but consume storage space. Use hard delete to permanently remove them when recovery is no longer needed.

dataExport.title: Data Export
dataExport.csvExportDescription: Export annotation data as a CSV file containing classification labels, confidence scores, media references, and metadata.
dataExport.zipExportDescription: Export annotation data as CSV along with all associated media files packaged in a ZIP archive for complete analysis.

zipContents.mediaFolder: media/ folder with all referenced files

dataExport.boundingBoxCsvDescription: Export bounding box annotation data as a CSV file containing coordinates, confidence scores, media references, and metadata.
dataExport.boundingBoxZipDescription: Export bounding box annotation data as CSV along with all associated media files packaged in a ZIP archive for complete analysis.

boundingBoxZipContents.mediaFolder: media/ folder with all referenced files
